DESCRIPTION: #yGems are #yUnplayable. NL At #yRest #ySites, you may spend 10 Gold to permanently remove a #yGem as a free action, then permanently #yModify a card in deck, the chosen card permanently gaining the #yGem's effects.  NL #yGems with effects that target foes will target one randomly if the card they are in does not target a specific one.
